title: 1.5 lakh sq ft tech research park inaugurated at Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad - Times of India
content: 1.5 lakh sq ft tech research park inaugurated at Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad  Times of India
description: A Technology Research Park (TRP) of about 1.5 lakh sq. ft was inaugurated at the Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad (IIT-H) on Saturday.
